title: Hack Your Way Into Business Class
itunes:title: Hack Your Way Into Business Class
description:
What’s better than turning left when you get on an airplane? Scoring the premium seat without actually paying a premium. This week, Mark and Nikki break down a handful of new and unsung strategies for booking cheaper business class fares. Then, Hanli Prisloo, champion free diver and onetime stunt double for Halle Berry shares several tips that focus on what lies below the (ocean’s) surface.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
